first.question: You left the grocery store with your purchases. What do you do next?
answers: You go to visit a friend
You go home straight away
You take a short walk before going home

You ask your friend if you could leave the shopping with him

kaveriKaks.question: Your friend refuses and says you should take the shopping to your home.
